remarks: Ordering relation for positive operators.  Definition of positive operator ordering in [Kreyszig] p. 470.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
leopg $p |- ( ( T e. A /\ U e. B ) -> ( T <_op U <-> ( ( U -op T ) e. HrmOp /\ A. x e. ~H 0 <_ ( ( ( U -op T ) ` x ) .ih x ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d T x $.
$d U x $.
